dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare approach the Pulsating Lump, puny one. Speak your purpose before I decide to crush you in one fell swoop.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I seek knowledge about this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Ha! Knowledge? You'll find none here, only pain and suffering. Turn back while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave then. Farewell, strange lump.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Depart before my patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your power. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? A wise choice. Your departure saves you from a gruesome fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a fight, Lump!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal! You bring this upon yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand answers! Tell me what you know.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demand? You have no leverage here, insignificant creature. What I know, I keep. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened. Prepare to face me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Bravery or folly, time will tell.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave for now, but mark my words, Lump. I shall return.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Empty threats. Your return will meet a harsher reception.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek an alliance. Together, we could be formidable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliance? With me? Laughable notion. I stand alone, as should you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. I'll take my leave then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision. Off you go, before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You'll regret your arrogance when facing the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance? Bold words from a mere speck. Depart before I teach you humility.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have come to challenge the mighty Thrum. Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge? Bold move, little one. I shall enjoy this.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm ready. Let's see what you're made of, Lump!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or foolishness? We shall see in combat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power. I offer my allegiance instead.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allegiance? A tempting proposal, but power such as mine stands alone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I bring a gift as a sign of respect to the mighty Thrum. Accept it, and let's talk.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A gift? Rare indeed. Show me what you have brought, and we may converse.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This amulet holds ancient enchantments. It is yours if you agree to parley.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enchantments? Intriguing. The gift is accepted. Speak your purpose, then.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek an alliance with you. Together, we can achieve great things.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance? An unexpected proposition. Your offer has merit. We shall speak further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand your surrender and allegiance. Accept, or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demanding, are we? Your threats wash over me like rain. I refuse.
